resources.string: Demo the following: A ConstraintLayout with a View set in each corner A ConstraintLayout with a View centered in the top, and two View as shown in the middle A ConstraintLayout with a background color, and a Guidline that is used to align a TextView, Button and two Views as shown A ConstraintLayout with overlapping Views as shown. A ConstraintLayout with a ScrollView that contains a TextView. The TextView contains very long text (you must scroll to see all of it). A ConstraintLayout with a Guideline and a Horizontal ScrollView. This ScrollView contains many Buttons (you have to scroll to see them all). A ConstraintLayout with a Guideline, TextView and nested layout (i.e. <include layout=\"@layout/my_sub_layout\"> ) that contains a Button and ScrollView with many checkboxes (as shown). Demo the following: A ConstraintLayout with a View set in each corner A ConstraintLayout with a View centered in the top, and two View as shown in the middle A ConstraintLayout with a background color, and a Guidline that is used to align a TextView, Button and two Views as shown A ConstraintLayout with overlapping Views as shown. A ConstraintLayout with a ScrollView that contains a TextView. The TextView contains very long text (you must scroll to see all of it). A ConstraintLayout with a Guideline and a Horizontal ScrollView. This ScrollView contains many Buttons (you have to scroll to see them all). A ConstraintLayout with a Guideline, TextView and nested layout (i.e. <include layout=\"@layout/my_sub_layout\"> ) that contains a Button and ScrollView with many checkboxes (as shown). nDemo the following: A ConstraintLayout with a View set in each corner A ConstraintLayout with a View centered in the top, and two View as shown in the middle A ConstraintLayout with a background color, and a Guidline that is used to align a TextView, Button and two Views as shown A ConstraintLayout with overlapping Views as shown. A ConstraintLayout with a ScrollView that contains a TextView. The TextView contains very long text (you must scroll to see all of it). A ConstraintLayout with a Guideline and a Horizontal ScrollView. This ScrollView contains many Buttons (you have to scroll to see them all).
